bio.summary: There are at least two artists with the name Atom. 1. Drum & Bass Dj & Producer from Brighton UK 2. Trance/Dance producer. 3. Japanese producers Heigo Tani and Shuichi Wada, aka Co-Fusion. 4. Italian black metal band 5.AToM - Macedonian jazz, fusion band 1. Brighton based Atom began his musical journey playing the drums in Rock bands before moving on to Hip Hop/Trip Hop with early Mo Wax releases. With support from Marcus Intalex, Fabio, Dj Flight, Loxy and an ever growing list of others expect big things from Atom. Read more on Last.fm
bio.content: There are at least two artists with the name Atom. 1. Drum & Bass Dj & Producer from Brighton UK 2. Trance/Dance producer. 3. Japanese producers Heigo Tani and Shuichi Wada, aka Co-Fusion. 4. Italian black metal band 5.AToM - Macedonian jazz, fusion band 1. Brighton based Atom began his musical journey playing the drums in Rock bands before moving on to Hip Hop/Trip Hop with early Mo Wax releases. With support from Marcus Intalex, Fabio, Dj Flight, Loxy and an ever growing list of others expect big things from Atom. http://www.atomworks.net http://soundcloud.com/atomdnb http://www.facebook.com/pages/Atom/75785817083 2. Most famous for the classic progressive pioneering trance hit, You're Not Alone, in 2001/2002 and now the new 20 single release from the CD Atom-You're Not Alone, Atom brought a new look and imitated sound to the trance/dance scene. Being one of the first male singers in a female dominated market, and against the record companies wishes, he even added rock guitars, now heard all over modern dance music. Atom has produced and written for many, many artists. The latest releases mostly occuring in 2004 to 2005, saw a double cd set, Millennium, the follow up second CD, Atom-I Have Returned, and the infamous, Destination Earth-Contact Day, and the You're Not Alone-The Singles Soon to be released are. Satellite Atom-Rare Elements 1,2,3,4 Atom-Back to Earth Atom-RE-Visitation Atom-Statues In The Park...more to come. iTunes Links Atom You’re Not AloneFirst Atom Album Released, also available online from most online stores. Atom I Have ReturnedFirst Atom Album Released, also available online from most online stores.Atom You’re Not AloneSecond Atom Album Released, also available online from most online stores.
